Variabele `r cat_var_names[i]`
----------------------------------------
The table shows the number of observations of each level.

``` {r results='asis'}
library(xtable)
xt <- xtable(table(cat_data[cat_var_names[i]]), caption = cat_var_names[i])
names(xt) <- c('count')
print(xtable(xt),type='html')

```
